Soaring above the clouds to see the Northern Lights and experience the breathtaking view of the aurora borealis from a bird's-eye perspective.
Traveling to the Great Barrier Reef, the world's largest coral reef, to scuba dive and see the wonders of marine life up close.
Venturing to the Great Library of Celsus in Ephesus, Turkey, to witness the ancient knowledge and manuscripts inside its walls.
Visiting Timbuktu, Mali, home to one of the oldest and largest libraries in the world, housing hundreds of thousands of precious books and manuscripts.
Going to The Great Wall of China to take in the impressive architecture and engineering of this historical landmark.
